snippet: The Obama administration on Tuesday relaxed restraints on humanitarian activities between Iran and the United States, including athletic exchanges.
abstract: Obama administration eases longstanding restraints on humanitarian and good-will activities between Iran and United States, including athletic exchanges.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration on Tuesday relaxed restraints on humanitarian activities between Iran and the United States, including athletic exchanges.

headline.main: U.S. Eases Sanctions to Allow Good-Will Exchanges With Iran

keywords.value: Office of Foreign Assets Control (United States Treasury)
keywords.name: organizations
